welcome_message_body: Welcome to Coatepeque, a charming city known for its beautiful lake and stunning natural scenery. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the wonders this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: La pampa Lago de Coatepeque
restaurants.description: La pampa Lago de Coatepeque is a argentinian restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ilopango International Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ilopango International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for all passengers.
